eu.amidst.core.exponentialfamily

Class ParameterVariables

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.core.exponentialfamily.ParameterVariables
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Iterable<Variable>

    public class ParameterVariables
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Variable>, java.io.Serializable
    This class is used to store and handle the creation of the parameter variables of an extended Bayesian network model EF_LearningBayesianNetwork.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
